content: ringwood pixie hat sizing sample fit 13 -17 head newborn each larger size adds about 2 to the fit to add more sizes yourself add in multiples of 8 to the total count materials 60m gedifra cuor di merino or any bulky weight baby friendly wool 5 0mm needles - 40 cm / 16 circular and a set of double pointed needles tapestry needle to weave in ends 8 stitch markers instructions cast on 64 72 80 stitches loosely using a method of your preference join in round without twisting ribbing purl 1 knit 1 repeat across all stitches repeat ribbing until work measures about 1 from cast on edge ringwood ringwood round 1/3 knit all ringwood round 2/3 knit all ringwood round 3/3 purl 1 knit 1 repeat across all stitches repeat all 3 rounds of ringwood until work measures 4 5 6 from cast on edge or desired height on the last round worked place a marker every 8 9 10 stitches or place 8 stitch markers evenly across work if modifying stitch count decrease for crown of hat as follows if using circular needles switch to double pointed when knitting in the round becomes awkward decrease round 1/3 knit all decrease round 2/3 knit all decrease round 3/3 * purl 1 knit 1 repeat until 2 stitches before marker knit 2 stitches together as one some rounds you will end on a knit some rounds on a purl both are fine repeat from * to the end of round each repeat of the decrease round will result in 8 fewer stitches continue all 3 decrease rounds until 8 stitches remain knit 2 more plain rounds without decreasing then cut yarn with about 4 remaining thread the end through the live stitches and pull tight to close weave in ends and enjoy
